translation.en: [on speakers] John Wick, excommunicado.
translation.zh: 约翰维克 驱逐 倒数

translation.en: In effect, 6:00 p.m., Eastern Standard Time.
translation.zh: 东部标准时间 傍晚6时 指令生效

translation.en: [Charon] I do hope that Mr Wick finds his way to safety.
translation.zh: 我真心希望维克先生可以全身而退

translation.en: He knew the rules, he broke them.
translation.zh: 他知道规则 却破坏了它

translation.en: And killed a man on company grounds, Charon.
translation.zh: 在公司领土上杀了那个男人 卡隆

translation.en: Do you expect him to make it out?
translation.zh: 你认为他能活得下来吗？

translation.en: $14 million bounty on his head,
and every interested party in this city wants a piece of it.
translation.zh: 悬赏1400万美元取他人头 这座城市的每个能者都想分一杯羹

translation.en: I'd say the odds are about even.
translation.zh: 是生是死 我会说概率均等

translation.en: [man] You think the hospital's there to help, man?
translation.zh: 兄弟 你以为医院会帮你？

translation.en: [laughing] No way!
translation.zh: 绝不可能！他们在让你以为

translation.en: They'll kill you just as soon as they'll make you better!
translation.zh: 自己好了之后就会马上杀了你

translation.en: [laughs] But I know better, man. I know better. I know what I'm...
translation.zh:
我很清楚 兄弟
我很清楚 我知道…

translation.en: Tick-tock, Mr Wick.
translation.zh: 时日无多 维克先生

translation.en: Tick-tock.
Tick-tock. Tick-tock. Tick... [laughing]
No time to dilly-dally, Mr Wick!
translation.zh: 没时间磨蹭了 维克先生！

translation.en: The New York Public Library.
You got it.
Change of plan.
To the Continental.
Can you see that he's received by the concierge?
translation.zh: 你可以确保礼宾部接收它吗？

translation.en: Yes, sir, Mr Wick.
Good dog. Good dog.
[on speakers] John Wick, excommunicado.
translation.zh: 约翰维克 驱逐 倒数

translation.en: In effect, 20 minutes.
Can I help you?
translation.zh: 有什么我可以帮你的吗？

translation.en: Russian Folktale. Alexander Afanasyev.
-[keyboard clacking] -[speaking Russian]
translation.zh: 亚历山大阿弗纳西耶夫

translation.en: -Level two. -Thank you.
[Ernest] "Consider your origins:
you were not made to live as brutes,
translation.zh: “你生来不是为了如野兽般活着…”

translation.en: but to follow virtue and knowledge."
Dante.
Looking a little run down there, John.
translation.zh: 约翰 你看起来似乎精疲力竭

translation.en: Ernest... I still have time.
translation.zh: 厄内斯特 时间还没到

translation.en: It's almost up. Who's gonna know the difference?
translation.zh: 这是迟早的事 有谁会知道？

translation.en: You sure this is what you wanna do?
Fourteen million. It's a lot of money.
Not if you can't spend it.
[John] Oh, shit.
[lead a cappella singer] Push it back.
[on speakers] John Wick, excommunicado.
translation.zh: 约翰维克 驱逐 倒数

translation.en: In effect, ten minutes.
Let it be known the Bowery will honour the excommunicado.
translation.zh: 公告天下 包厘街遵守驱逐令

translation.en: No help, no services of any kind.
translation.zh: 不给予援助 不提供任何形式的服务

translation.en: Doc! Doc, it's Wick!
[Doctor] Mr Wick.
No, no. You shouldn't be here. Hour's almost up.
translation.zh:
不 不 你不应该来这里
时限快到了

translation.en: I know, Doc, please. There's still time.
translation.zh: 我知道 医生 拜托 现在还来得及

translation.en: No! I can't.
I still have five minutes!
Please.
Come on. Come on.
All right, sit there.
All right, let me see. Let me see.
translation.zh: 来 让我看看 我看看

translation.en: Puncture wound.
Ah. Went deep. Nicked the artery.
Here you go.
[Doctor] All right.
[on speakers] John Wick, excommunicado.
translation.zh: 约翰维克 驱逐 倒数

translation.en: In effect, one minute.
Doc?
Doc?
Yeah. We're halfway there.
translation.zh: 是 已经进行到一半了

translation.en: -Aah. Five seconds. -Yeah.
[on speakers] John Wick, excommunicado.
translation.zh: 约翰维克 驱逐 倒数

translation.en: In effect, in five, four...
-[ticking] -Three, two...
One.
[sighs] Sorry, Mr Wick.
I know. Rules.
Ah, rules.
[operator, on speakers] John Wick, 14 million. Open contract is now in effect.
translation.zh:
约翰维克 1400万
公开合约立时生效

translation.en: All services are suspended.
And away we go.
[Doctor] Top shelf. On the right.
Yeah. Take four.
It will give you energy. Help with the pain.
translation.zh: 能给你补充能量 也有助于减轻痛苦

translation.en: [sighs] Mr Wick?
They'll never believe I stopped on the hour.
translation.zh: 他们不会相信我在时限前停手

translation.en: But you did.
They'll know.
Know what?
I told you where the medicine was.
-Where? -Here.
Just below my floating rib. Be sure not to hit my--
translation.zh:
在我的浮肋之下
务必注意不要打中大肠部位

translation.en: Oh, wait!
One may not be enough.
Yeah. All right.
Be sure not to graze my--
Good luck, Mr Wick.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 维克先生

translation.en: Thanks, Doc.
[in Mandarin] That's him.
[in Mandarin] Yeah. Let's go.
Tell them he's arriving at the corner.
[on speakers] John Wick. Open contract.
translation.zh: 约翰维克 公开合约

translation.en: Increase, 15 million.
Where are you going, Jonathan?
translation.zh: 你要上哪儿去 强纳森？

translation.en: We are closed.
[in Russian] It's been a while.
And the belt.
[in Russian] Show him the way.
[in Russian] Be seeing you.
[men, in Russian] Be seeing you.
[The Director, in Russian] Again!
[in Russian] Again!
[in English] Jardani. Why have you come home?
translation.zh: 祖丹尼 你怎么回家来了？

translation.en: You present this to me like an answer.
I still have my ticket.
After all the chaos you've caused for the last few weeks,
translation.zh:
你这几个星期制
造了这么多纷乱之后

translation.en: you think your ticket is valid?
translation.zh: 你以为你的信物还有效用？

translation.en: Do you forget that the Ruska Roma is bound by the High Table,
translation.zh: 你忘了组织同样也受高桌会所约束

translation.en: and the High Table stands above all?
translation.zh: 而高桌会是至高无上的？

translation.en: They could kill me just for talking to you.
translation.zh: 我现在跟你说话 足以惹上杀身之祸

translation.en: You honour me by bringing death to my front door.
translation.zh:
你尊重我的方式
竟然是把死神引到我面前

translation.en: Oh, Jardani, what has become of you?
translation.zh: 祖丹尼 你究竟是怎么了？

translation.en: [in Russian] I am Jardani Jovonovich.
translation.zh: 我是祖丹尼约万诺维奇

translation.en: I am a child of the Belarus,
an orphan of your tribe...
You are bound to help me...
[in English] You are bound,
and I am owed.
Rooney, enough!
[in Russian] With me.
[in English] "You are owed." You are owed nothing, Jardani.
translation.zh:
“是你亏欠我的”
没有人欠你什么 祖丹尼

translation.en: You know, when my pupils first come here, they wish for one thing,
translation.zh:
你知道我的学生们刚来的时候
祈求的只有一件事

translation.en: a life free of suffering.
I try to dissuade them from these childish notions, but as you know,
translation.zh:
我试图改变他们这些
幼稚的想法 但你也知道

translation.en: art is pain.
Life is suffering.
Somehow, you managed to get out.
translation.zh: 你以前也曾成功离开组织

translation.en: But here you are, back where you began.
All of this, for what?
translation.zh: 这一切值得吗？为了什么？

translation.en: [in Russian] Because of a puppy?
[in Russian] It wasn't just a puppy.
[in Russian] Fond memories?
[in English] Pirouette.
Pirouette, pirouette.
[Director, in English] Sit.
Even if I wanted to, I can't help you, Jardani.
translation.zh: 就算我想帮你 也有心无力 祖丹尼

translation.en: The High Table wants your life.
How can you fight the wind?
How can you smash the mountains?
How can you bury the ocean?
How can you escape from the light?
Of course, you can go to the dark.
translation.zh: 当然 你可以走进黑暗

translation.en: But they're in the dark, too.
So, tell me, Jardani. What do you really want?
translation.zh: 那么告诉我 祖丹尼 你要的究竟是什么？

translation.en: Passage.
Where did you want to go?
Casablanca.
The path to paradise begins in hell.
So be it.
You hand me your ticket, I will tear it.
translation.zh: 你把信物给我 我会兑现

translation.en: If that's what you really desire.
translation.zh: 如果这是你真心想要的

translation.en: With this, Jardani, your ticket is torn.
translation.zh: 如此一来 祖丹尼 你的信物已毁

translation.en: You can never come home again.
Take him to the lifeboat.
Welcome to the Continental. How may I help you?
translation.zh:
欢迎光临大陆酒店
有什么我可以帮你的吗？

translation.en: Sir. There is an Adjudicator here to see you.
translation.zh: 先生 有位审判者想见你

translation.en: Very well, sir.
The manager is in the lounge.
[Winston] I presume you're here to discuss John Wick.
translation.zh: 我相信你是来谈约翰维克的事

translation.en: If that's so, we can make this short.
translation.zh: 如果是这样的话 我们可以长话短说

translation.en: I told him to walk away, he declined to do so.
translation.zh: 我要他离开 他拒绝

translation.en: And that's the all of it.
Mr Wick broke the rules.
Oh, yes.
And I haven't got the slightest idea where he is--
translation.zh: 我完全不知道他身在何处

translation.en: You're mistaken.
I'm not here for Mr Wick.
translation.zh: 我不是为了维克先生而来

translation.en: I'm here because Mr Wick broke the rules in this hotel.
translation.zh:
我来是因为维克先生
在这家酒店破坏了规则

translation.en: on the grounds of the Continental. Was it not?
translation.zh: 血溅大陆酒店 不是吗？

translation.en: Oh, yes.
As a matter of fact, the body gets colder within these very walls.
translation.zh: 事实上 尸体在这高墙内格外地僵冷

translation.en: I'd like to see it.
Santino D'Antonio.
A newly instated member of the High Table,
slain by Mr Wick while seeking sanctuary in the Continental.
translation.zh:
在大陆酒店寻求庇护时
遭维克先生杀害

translation.en: With a .45 ACP, it appears.
I had no control over Mr Wick's actions.
translation.zh: 对于维克先生的行为 我无法控制

translation.en: And yet, he lives because you deemed it so, yes?
translation.zh: 而他 在你的纵容下还活着 对吧？

translation.en: Yes.
You have known Mr Wick for a great many years. It might even be fair to call you friends, yes?
translation.zh:
你和维克先生相识多年
说你们是朋友 没错吧？

translation.en: Instead of stopping him, instead of killing him,
translation.zh: 本该阻止他 本该杀了他

translation.en: you stood by and let him walk away
translation.zh:
你眼睁睁看着他枪杀
桑提诺德安东尼奥

translation.en: after he shot Santino D'Antonio in front of you.
translation.zh: 不但袖手旁观 还让他离开

translation.en: I made him excommunicado.
But not before you gave him an hour to escape.
translation.zh: 那是在你给他一小时的逃脱时间之后

translation.en: He broke the rules in my hotel.
translation.zh: 他破坏了我的酒店的规则

translation.en: This is exactly the problem, your hotel.
translation.zh: 这就是问题所在 你的酒店

translation.en: Where is your fealty?
I've been of service for over 40 years.
Under the Table. Serving the Table.
translation.zh: 在高桌之下 效命高桌会

translation.en: Everything is under the Table.
I understand that you have your loyalties, but this cannot be overlooked.
translation.zh:
我知道你尽忠职守
但这件事不能就此了结

translation.en: Let me be clear. I am here to adjudge you.
translation.zh: 让我说明来意 我是来判决你的

translation.en: You have one week to get your affairs in order.
translation.zh: 你有一个星期的时间完成交接工作

translation.en: Excuse me?
At such time, your successor will be named.
translation.zh: 你的继任者将在那时宣布

translation.en: There are rules, they are the only things that separate us--
translation.zh: 世间有规则 这也就是区隔我们人类

translation.en: -From the animals. -Yes.
You have seven days.
In the meantime, if you need any assistance with your transition,
translation.zh: 在这过渡期 如果你需要任何协助

translation.en: you may look for me in room 217.
Enjoy your stay at the Continental.
translation.zh: 祝你在大陆酒店过得愉快

translation.en: There's an Adjudicator here to see you.
Welcome to my Mission Control.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到我的任务中央控管

translation.en: Brain stem of my operation. The information super flyway
translation.zh: 我行动的大脑 超级信息中心

translation.en: from whence I control the word on the street, the way of the world.
translation.zh:
我在此探知街头各类讯息
掌控天下大势

translation.en: With pigeons.
Yes. You see rats with wings, but I see the Internet.
translation.zh:
是 你看到的是长翅膀的老鼠
但我看到的是网络

translation.en: No IP addresses. No digital footprint.
translation.zh: 没有IP地址 不留数码线索

translation.en: Can't track it, can't hack it, can't trace it.
translation.zh: 无迹可寻 无法入侵 无从追踪

translation.en: Can you get disease from it?
Well, I wouldn't recommend that you eat one.
translation.zh: 我并不推荐你把它作为食物

translation.en: What the hell do you want?
I wanted to see where it didn't happen.
translation.zh: 我想看看没有发生的那个地方

translation.en: Where what didn't happen?
Where you didn't kill John Wick.
translation.zh: 你没有杀死约翰维克的地方

translation.en: I've always been under the impression that contracts and executing them was optional.
translation.zh: 我一直以为合约及其执行不是必然

translation.en: I have no problem with John Wick.
translation.zh: 我对约翰维克没有意见

translation.en: And yet, you gave John a seven-round Kimber 1911,
translation.zh:
所以你给了约翰
一把七轮金柏1911手枪

translation.en: knowing that he intended to use it to stand against the Table. Yes?
translation.zh: 明知他有意用来对抗高桌会 是吗？

translation.en: This Kimber 1911, to be exact.
You gave John Wick seven bullets, the High Table is giving you seven days.
translation.zh:
你给了约翰维克七颗子弹
现在高桌会给你七天时间

translation.en: Seven days for what, exactly?
To settle your affairs and find a new home for your birds.
translation.zh: 处理好你的事 为你的鸟找新家

translation.en: In seven days, you abdicate your throne.
translation.zh: 七天之后 你必须退位

translation.en: Oh, my dear. Tell me, do you know what the Bowery is, Adjudicator?
translation.zh:
甜心 告诉我
你知道包厘街是什么吗 审裁官？

translation.en: Do you know what happens when I wave my hand?
translation.zh: 你知道我挥挥手 会发生什么事吗？

translation.en: No, there will be no replacement for me on the throne.
translation.zh: 不 不会有人敢篡位取代我

translation.en: Because I am the throne, baby.
translation.zh: 因为我就是王位 宝贝

translation.en: I am the Bowery!
I am all that you deign not to look at when you walk down the street at night.
translation.zh:
夜晚当你走在街头
你一定不屑去看看四周吧

translation.en: The Bowery is mine. Mine alone.
translation.zh: 包厘街属于我 唯我独尊

translation.en: Do not make the mistake of thinking you exist outside the rules, no men do.
translation.zh:
不要误以为你可以活在规则之外
没有人可以

translation.en: You have seven days.
[Yassin] Enough!
I'm afraid our friend here is off limits.
translation.zh: 我想我们这位朋友不能碰

translation.en: But he's excommunicado.
It seems the manager has granted him amnesty.
Mr Jonathan,
would you be so kind as to come with me?
Welcome to Casablanca, Mr Wick.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到卡萨布兰卡 维克先生

translation.en: -Thanks. -[laughing]
[Yassin] Mr Jonathan,
it has been a long time since our fine city has been graced with your presence.
translation.zh:
你已许久未大驾光临
我们这座美丽的城市

translation.en: I need to talk to--
Yes, Ms Al-Azwar, she's expecting you.
translation.zh: 是 阿兹瓦尔小姐等候多时

translation.en: My, my, welcome to the Moroccan Continental.
translation.zh: 来 欢迎光临摩洛哥大陆酒店

translation.en: I hope you'll find it to your taste.
translation.zh: 我希望你会喜欢这里的一切

translation.en: Right this way.
Ms Al-Azwar, she waits for no man.
translation.zh: 阿兹瓦尔小姐是不等人的

translation.en: Best of luck, Mr Jonathan. Best of luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 强纳森先生 祝你好运

translation.en: [woman] You a dog person, John?
-[gun cocks] -[John] Sofia?
[groans] Sofia!
You can't kill the bearer of your marker.
translation.zh: 你不能杀你血誓印记徽章的持有人

translation.en: I didn't kill you. I just shot you.
translation.zh: 我没有杀你 我只是对你开了枪

translation.en: Nice suit.
Good to see you, too.
I should shoot you in the head right now.
translation.zh: 我现在应该朝你的脑袋开枪

translation.en: I know.
Don't you do it.
You're excommunicado, John.
translation.zh: 你被逐出组织了 约翰

translation.en: And that marker doesn't mean shit.
This is your blood.
Your bond.
When you needed help... I was there.
translation.zh: 当你需要帮忙的时候 我在那

translation.en: Sit.
I was talking to you, John.
You do realise that I'm management now, right?
translation.zh: 你应该知道我现在是管理层吧？

translation.en: I'm not service any more, John.
translation.zh: 约翰 我已经不再提供服务了

translation.en: So, I don't go around shooting people in the head.
translation.zh: 我已不再四处朝着人家的脑袋开枪

translation.en: I'm not asking you to kill anyone.
I just need you to get me to him.
-To who? -Your old boss.
You want to kill Berrada.
I'm not gonna kill him. I just need to talk.
translation.zh: 我没有要杀人 我只想谈一谈

translation.en: What could he possibly give to you?
Guidance.
Look, I made a deal when I agreed to run this hotel.
translation.zh: 我在同意经营这家酒店时达成协议

translation.en: And that deal said that I had to follow the rules of the Table.
translation.zh: 必须遵循高桌会的规则

translation.en: If you're not gonna kill him, he is gonna kill you,
translation.zh: 就算你不是要杀他 他也一定会杀你

translation.en: and then probably me, too, for walking you up in there.
translation.zh: 也许还殃及把你带去见他的我

translation.en: If I make one mistake, one enemy...
translation.zh: 我多犯下一个错误 多了一个敌人…

translation.en: maybe somebody goes looking for my daughter.
translation.zh: 可能就会有人找上我女儿

translation.en: And I know what you did, John, to get her out.
translation.zh: 我知道你为了救她所做的一切

translation.en: But that's not a chance I can take. Sorry.
translation.zh: 但我不能冒险 对不起

translation.en: Do you wanna know where she is?
No. I don't ever wanna know,
translation.zh: 不 我永远都不想知道

translation.en: because I don't trust that I won't go find her.
translation.zh: 因为我信不过自己 我怕我会去找她

translation.en: A part of me longs for her.
translation.zh: 有一部分的我渴望见到她

translation.en: And I have to kill that part of myself every day,
translation.zh: 我每天必须扼杀那部分的我

translation.en: just to keep her safe.
Because sometimes you have to kill what you love.
translation.zh: 因为有时你必须杀死你所爱的

translation.en: That's why I gave you that marker in the first place.
translation.zh: 这就是为什么我给了你那个徽章

translation.en: That's why I'm sitting here right now, and that's why I'm fucked!
translation.zh: 这就是为什么我到现在还坐在这里 这就是为什么我完蛋了！

translation.en: -Consequences. -Yeah.
Consequences.
I'm just asking you to try.
Either way, you and me,
we'll be even.
No.
After this, we are less than even.
translation.zh: 这样一来 我们更恩怨难断

translation.en: We leave in ten minutes.
[in English] How can I help you?
I wasn't expecting the High Table so soon.
translation.zh: 没想到高桌会来得这么快

translation.en: [The Adjudicator] There is a task.
It involves someone who broke the rules and stood against the Table.
translation.zh: 是一个破坏规则、违抗高桌会的人

translation.en: John Wick, you mean.
My students have not been idle.
translation.zh: 我的徒弟们都没闲着呢

translation.en: John Wick and all who've helped him.
translation.zh: 目标是约翰维克和所有帮过他的人

translation.en: You've heard the stories about him, of course.
translation.zh: 你一定听说过他的传说

translation.en: Killed scores of men this past week alone because of--
translation.zh:
过去一周杀了数不尽的人
就是为了…

translation.en: A dog, a car.
I'm familiar.
And I'm interested.
Very.
Blowfish. Very fatal.
No soy.
I have served, I will be of service.
translation.zh: 我鞠躬尽瘁 愿为组织效命

translation.en: -Stop! -[music stops]
Out!
The High Table and the Ruska Roma have an understanding.
translation.zh: 我们和高桌会早有共识

translation.en: Yes, and you helped John Wick.
translation.zh: 是 但你帮了约翰维克

translation.en: He had a ticket.
But a ticket does not stand above the Table.
translation.zh: 区区信物怎可凌驾于高桌会

translation.en: Your penance will be paid in blood.
Now...
hold out your helping hands and pledge your fealty.
translation.zh: 伸出你的双手 宣誓你的忠诚

translation.en: I have served, I will be of service.
translation.zh: 我鞠躬尽瘁 愿为组织效命

translation.en: We're not going in like the old days.
translation.zh: 我们这次去不要像从前那样

translation.en: It's just a conversation.
[sighs] Nothing's ever just a conversation with you, John.
translation.zh: 有你在 不可能只是一场谈话 约翰

translation.en: Let's go.
[Berrada] Sofia.
Always so nice to see you.
translation.zh: 看见你 我总是很高兴

translation.en: And the dogs, of course, how marvellous. May I pet one?
translation.zh:
当然还有这些狗 太不可思议了
我可以摸摸它吗？

translation.en: Certainly.
[in English] Fantastic.
Jonathan Wick.
I had heard you had made your way to our shores.
translation.zh: 我听说你到了我们的管辖区

translation.en: Come along now. I am certain we have much to discuss.
translation.zh:
一起来吧
我想我们一定有很多事情要讨论

translation.en: I must admit, I am curious. What brings you to my domain?
translation.zh:
我必须承认 我很好奇
你为什么来到我的领土？

translation.en: Do you come here to kill me?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你是来杀我的？

translation.en: No.
Mr Wick, do you know where the word "assassin" comes from?
translation.zh:
维克先生 你知道
英语“刺客”一词从何而来吗？

translation.en: People argue... "Assassin."
Hashasheen, followers of Hassan-i...
translation.zh: 阿萨辛 哈桑的跟随者

translation.en: eaters of hashish. [chuckles]
No, thank you.
But others contend it comes from asāsiyyūn,
translation.zh: 但也有人说是来自另一个词汇

translation.en: meaning, "men who are faithful and who abide by their beliefs."
translation.zh: 意思是“忠诚并遵循信念的男人”

translation.en: You see that coin?
The first coin ever minted in this facility.
translation.zh: 这里铸造的第一个金币

translation.en: Next to it, the first marker.
Not easy to track down, believe me.
translation.zh: 不容易找到 相信我

translation.en: Now, this coin, of course, it does not represent monetary value.
translation.zh: 这个金币当然没有实质的价值

translation.en: It represents the commerce of relationships,
a social contract in which you agree to partake.
translation.zh: 你同意参与的社交契约

translation.en: Order and rules.
You have broken the rules.
The High Table has marked you for death.
Why would I allow you to leave here alive,
translation.zh: 我为什么要让你从这里活着走出去…

translation.en: when your life has been, by your own actions, forfeit?
translation.zh:
当你的生命已经被
自己的行为而摧毁？

translation.en: I seek to make amends,
to pay for what I've done.
translation.zh: 为自己所做的付出代价

translation.en: I seek a meeting with the one who sits above the Table.
translation.zh:
我希望可以和凌驾于
高桌会的那一位协商

translation.en: This dog, I do so love it.
translation.zh: 这只狗 我挺喜欢的

translation.en: Tell me, does it shed a great deal?
translation.zh: 告诉我 它会掉很多毛吗？

translation.en: Occasionally.
When I leave, you can tell the Elder I'm coming.
translation.zh: 我离开之后 你可以告诉长老我会来

translation.en: And if he wants me dead--
Then he will see to it that your bones bleach under the sun.
translation.zh: 那么他会亲自确保你尸骨无存

translation.en: I see.
And I would have provided him with a choice.
translation.zh: 我本来会给他一个选择

translation.en: I am sorry, Mr Wick.
I cannot tell you where to find the Elder.
translation.zh: 我不能告诉你长老在哪里

translation.en: You fail to understand.
The Elder is not a man you find.
translation.zh: 长老不是你可以找得到的人

translation.en: He can only choose to find you. You wish to speak with him?
translation.zh: 除非他自己来找你 你想跟他谈？

translation.en: Go to the edge of the desert, look up.
translation.zh: 到沙漠的边缘地带 抬头仰望

translation.en: Canis Minor, the dog that followed Orion through the sky.
translation.zh: 小犬星座 然后跟随天上的猎户星

translation.en: You follow the brightest star.
Walk until you are almost dead.
translation.zh: 一直走 到你快死去为止

translation.en: Then, keep walking.
When you are on your last breath,
translation.zh: 直到你咽下最后一口气

translation.en: he will find you. Or he will not.
translation.zh: 或许他会找你 或许他不会

translation.en: I am grateful.
Thank you, sir.
Perhaps you were not listening before.
The social contract.
The commerce of relationships.
You have received a great gift. I have hosted your friend.
translation.zh:
你收到了一份大礼
我接待了你的朋友

translation.en: What do you offer in return?
So soft, and yet, so fierce.
translation.zh: 那么软萌 却也那么凶悍

translation.en: I love it, this dog.
I will keep it.
Excuse me?
This will be my gift.
This will be how you show me your fealty.
No.
Surely it's the least you can do.
No, you cannot keep my dog.
translation.zh: 不 你不能留下我的狗

translation.en: Very well.
Very well.
Then I will kill it.
[Berrada] I'm sorry, Sofia.
This was for you to learn.
translation.zh: 这是你必须学的一堂课

translation.en: Don't.
Sofia. Don't.
He shot my dog.
I get it.
[Sofia] We gotta go. Now.
Here you go.
You're gonna die, John.
Whether out here in this desert,
or somewhere else down the road.
But you are gonna die.
Consequences.
Consequences.
Better get going.
Sofia.
Okay.
You made your point.
You have earned my fealty.
Matter of fact,
I'm gonna shove so much fealty up your ass it's gonna come spilling out of your mouth.
translation.zh:
我的忠诚多到塞爆你的屁眼
再从你嘴里吐出来

translation.en: You had your chance.
Well, since you see it that way,
I guess it's time I told you to climb down off your High Table
translation.zh: 那么我是时候告诉你 从你的高桌给我爬下来 滚回家吧

translation.en: and go fuck yourself.
translation.zh: 从你的高桌给我爬下来 滚回家吧

translation.en: Duly noted.
You gave John Wick seven bullets,
translation.zh: 你给了约翰维克七颗子弹

translation.en: your penance will be paid with seven cuts.
translation.zh: 你将以七处伤口作为补偿

translation.en: Well, sometimes you gotta cut a motherfucker.
translation.zh: 有时看到混蛋 你会忍不住想砍人

translation.en: Avert your eyes, my sweet.
The king is dead.
Long live the king.
[The Elder] Drink.
Don't worry, your weapon is still there. Please drink.
translation.zh: 别担心 你的武器还在 请喝吧

translation.en: My son, how have you come to be so lost?
translation.zh: 孩子 你怎么迷失方向了？

translation.en: [John] Not lost.
Looking for you.
[The Elder] You think I speak of your location?
translation.zh: 你以为我指的是你所在的位置？

translation.en: Never seen a man fight so hard to end up back where he started.
translation.zh:
我从未见过一个如此艰辛奋战
却是为了回到最初起点的人

translation.en: So, tell me, Jonathan.
Why do you wish to live?
My wife, Helen.
To remember her. To remember us.
translation.zh: 为了记着她 记着我们

translation.en: So, you seek to live for the memory of love?
translation.zh: 所以你是为了爱的记忆而活？

translation.en: At least a chance to earn it.
I can give you one last chance to earn a life.
translation.zh: 我给你最后一个能活着的机会

translation.en: However, it might not be the life that you wish.
translation.zh: 但这未必是你想过的人生

translation.en: Complete a task for us, and your excommunicado will be reversed,
translation.zh:
为我们完成一项任务
你的驱逐令就会取消

translation.en: the open contract closed.
You would be permitted to continue to live.
Not free under the Table, but bound to it.
translation.zh:
但不再有个人自由
而是听命于高桌会

translation.en: Doing what you do best for the rest of your days.
translation.zh: 在剩下的日子竭尽所能

translation.en: The choice is yours.
Die here and now,
or continue to live and remember through death.
What must be done?
The cost of your life will be the death of others,
translation.zh: 你的生命必须用别人的死亡交换

translation.en: the first of which will be the man they call Winston.
translation.zh: 第一个就是他们叫温斯顿的男人

translation.en: What?
He has forgotten his fealty.
translation.zh: 他已忘了他该效忠的对象

translation.en: Neither the open contract nor the excommunicado
translation.zh:
直到你完成任务之前
公开合约或者驱逐令

translation.en: will be lifted until you complete your task.
translation.zh:
直到你完成任务之前
公开合约或者驱逐令 都不会解除

translation.en: So, if you wish to live,
and if you wish to remember,
this is the choice you must make.
translation.zh: 这就是你所必须做出的选择

translation.en: I will serve.
I will be of service.
Very well, my son.
Cast aside your weakness and reaffirm your fealty to the table.
translation.zh:
把你的弱点抛一边
重新向高桌会忠诚宣誓

translation.en: Mr John Wick.
[in Arabic] I want to see.
Show me.
[The Elder, in English] Thank you.
I accept this offering and your fealty.
translation.zh: 我接受你的奉献 以及你的效忠

translation.en: I wish you good luck on your path.
translation.zh: 希望你这一路上获得好运

translation.en: Zahir will help you prepare for your departure.
translation.zh: 查希尔会为你的离开做准备

translation.en: And, Mr Wick...
[in Arabic] Welcome back.
[announcer on PA] JFK Express now arriving on platform nine.
JFK Express now arriving on platform nine.
[teacher] Stick together, kids.
translation.zh: 孩子们 在一起不要分散

translation.en: Make sure you're holding the hand of the person in front and behind you.
translation.zh: 和前面以及后面的人手牵手

translation.en: You see? That's why you're special, John Wick.
translation.zh: 看？这就是你特别之处 约翰维克

translation.en: I wouldn't have stopped.
It's good to have you back.
How was your trip?
Going to the Continental?
He with you?
-[body thuds] -He was.
Nice trick.
Sir! Put your weapon down.
[Zero] He's excommunicado.
Unless you wish to become the same...
translation.zh: 除非你想落得相同命运

translation.en: I suggest you lower your gun.
I'd like to see the manager.
Of course.
If you would be so kind as to follow me.
Please take a seat. I will let him know you have arrived.
translation.zh: 请坐 我会让他知道你已经来了

translation.en: I gotta tell you, I've been looking forward to meeting you for a long time.
translation.zh:
我一定要跟你说 我一直
期待和你见面

translation.en: I'm a huge fan. John Wick.
translation.zh: 我是你的铁粉 约翰维克

translation.en: And so far, you haven't disappointed.
translation.zh: 到目前为止 你都没让我失望

translation.en: Is that the dog?
He likes you.
Me? I'm more of a cat person myself.
Hey, dog.
We're the same, you know. Both given the same gift.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？我们是同一类人
有着相同的天赋

translation.en: We're not the same.
Yes, we are.
No, we're not.
The manager is ready for you now. In the administrative lounge, sir.
translation.zh:
经理已经在等你了
就在行政会客室 先生

translation.en: [in Japanese] We're both masters of death.
Mr Wick.
[in English] Sit.
Stay.
Good dog.
Tread carefully, Jonathan.
We only use this room on special occasions,
translation.zh:
只在特殊的日子
我们才使用这个房间

translation.en: when you simply have to see what your opponent is holding under the table.
translation.zh:
当你想看看你的对手
在桌底下手上拿的是什么

translation.en: How was your journey here? Eventful?
translation.zh: 这趟旅程如何？收获丰富吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, of course.
They sent men to kill you, and now you to kill me.
translation.zh:
他们派人来杀你
然后现在派你来杀我

translation.en: Isn't that why you're here?
translation.zh: 你不就是为此而来的吗？

translation.en: I have served... I will be of service.
translation.zh: 我鞠躬尽瘁 愿为组织效命

translation.en: But you're having doubts.
Just don't make the mistake of pretending this is personal.
translation.zh: 不过不要犯公私不分的错误

translation.en: If you feel you must...
translation.zh: 如果你觉得你必须这么做…

translation.en: put a bullet through my heart.
translation.zh: 就在我的心上开一枪吧

translation.en: The High Table has asked me to step down.
The hour?
The hour.
You should have killed me in the Continental.
translation.zh: 你应该在大陆酒店里杀了我

translation.en: Maybe I should have.
Rules and consequences.
It seems like everyone is suffering from the consequences of their actions.
translation.zh:
每个人似乎都在为
自己的行为承担后果

translation.en: And you're not stepping down?
No.
I don't think I am.
So, it's war?
You're going to war with the High Table?
Skirmish.
Unless you decide to shoot me.
But then, I'd rather die at the hand of a friend
translation.zh: 不过 我确实宁愿死在朋友手上

translation.en: than that of an enemy.
No, I've made my choice. It's up to you to make yours.
translation.zh:
我已经决定了
现在轮到你做自己的决定

translation.en: What choice?
You shoot me, you sell your soul.
translation.zh: 你开枪射我 你出卖自己的灵魂

translation.en: But I'll be alive. And I can remember her.
translation.zh: 但我可以活着 我可以记着她

translation.en: Until you die as a servant of the High Table.
translation.zh: 直到你作为高桌会仆人死去为止

translation.en: Now, you did the impossible, you stopped, you got out.
translation.zh:
你现在做了不可能的事
你金盆洗手 退出江湖

translation.en: You only came back because Helen was taken away from you.
translation.zh: 你回来因为你失去了海伦

translation.en: The real question is, who do you wish to die as?
translation.zh:
真正的问题是
你希望死后 大家怎么记着你？

translation.en: The Baba Yaga?
The last thing many men ever see?
translation.zh: 很多男人生命最后一刻看见的人？

translation.en: Or as a man who loved and was loved by his wife?
translation.zh:
还是一个深爱着妻子、
也被妻子深爱的男人？

translation.en: Who do you wish to die as, Jonathan?
translation.zh: 你希望大家怎么记着你 强纳森？

translation.en: Mr Wick, it's a pleasure to meet you.
translation.zh: 维克先生 很高兴见到你

translation.en: I am an Adjudicator.
Have you decided to step down?
I think not.
And you? Will you be putting a bullet in his head?
translation.zh: 你呢 会朝他脑袋开一枪吗？

translation.en: No, I don't think I will.
Very well.
Administration.
[The Adjudicator] I'd like to change a designation.
Verification?
Adjudication 1-0-1-1-9-7-9.
The Continental Hotel, New York.
[administrator] New designation?
Deconsecrated.
Processing.
[on speakers] Administrator.
File, the New York Continental Hotel.
translation.zh: 档案 纽约大陆酒店

translation.en: The New York Continental Hotel has been deconsecrated. Goodbye.
translation.zh: 纽约大陆酒店已被“解封” 再见

translation.en: Gentlemen, this institution is now deconsecrated.
translation.zh: 先生们 这家机构如今已被“解封”

translation.en: Business may now be conducted on Continental grounds.
translation.zh: 裁决可以在大陆酒店进行了

translation.en: Since you are refusing to step down,
and you are refusing a direct order, your lives are now forfeit.
translation.zh: 你拒绝直接命令 你们的生命将被剥夺

translation.en: High Table emissaries will be joining you presently
translation.zh: 高桌会密使们很快就会前来…

translation.en: to see the removal of your souls from the property.
translation.zh: 确保你们的灵魂从这里移除

translation.en: Good evening, gentlemen.
This haven is safe no more.
Are services still off limits to me?
translation.zh: 对我的服务依然是中止的吗？

translation.en: Under the circumstances, your privileges are reinstated immediately.
translation.zh: 在特殊情况下 你的特权即刻被恢复

translation.en: What do you need?
Guns. Lots of guns.
Let's make a withdrawal.
[Charon] Remember, sir. These will be High Table forces.
translation.zh: 先生 要记得 那些是高桌会的部队

translation.en: We may have to consider our choices carefully.
Why?
Much has changed during your time away.
translation.zh: 你退隐的时候 很多事情已经改变

translation.en: Like what?
Well, let us say they have made armour improvements.
translation.zh: 像是武器装备上的改良

translation.en: May I suggest the 2011 Combat Master
in combination with the nine millimetre major.
[male announcer on PA] Attention, all guests.
The Continental Hotel is closing for fumigation.
translation.zh: 大陆酒店因进行烟熏消毒而关闭

translation.en: We apologise for the inconvenience.
translation.zh: 如有造成任何不便 我们深感抱歉

translation.en: Please make your way to the nearest exit.
Attention, all guests. The Continental Hotel...
translation.zh: 注意 所有住客 大陆酒店

translation.en: It seems circumstances have changed in your favour.
translation.zh: 情况有变 而且看起来对你有利

translation.en: Your transaction may now be conducted on Continental grounds.
translation.zh: 你的交易可以在大陆酒店里进行

translation.en: We'll be sending some of our finest for additional support.
translation.zh: 我们会派出最强的增援

translation.en: Cool. Very cool.
125 grain, 1,425 feet per second.
Serious business.
Thank you.
Let us begin.
Charon, would you help set the mood for our new guests?
translation.zh:
卡隆 可以为我们的
新客人营造气氛吗？

translation.en: Of course, sir.
I know you'll do the Continental proud.
translation.zh: 我知道你会让大陆酒店以你为傲

translation.en: I'll see you soon, sir.
And you, Jonathan, do what you do best.
translation.zh:
还有你 强纳森
竭尽全力做你所能做的

translation.en: What's that?
Hunt.
[in Latin] If you want peace
prepare for war
Winston! Winston!
I need more firepower.
Armour improvements.
Twelve-gauge steel slugs. Armour-piercing.
[in Japanese] No one kills you but me.
translation.zh: 没有人杀得了你 除了我

translation.en: [in English] Only by my sword, John.
translation.zh: 只待我的剑出鞘 约翰

translation.en: [The Adjudicator] I know you believe you can keep this up. But I assure you--
translation.zh:
我知道你以为可以继续撑下去
但我向你保证…

translation.en: [in Indonesian] Nice to meet you, Mr Wick.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 维克先生

translation.en: [in Indonesian] It's an honour to fight with you, Mr Wick.
translation.zh:
能和你并肩作战是我的荣耀
维克先生

translation.en: [in Indonesian] He's getting slow.
He's been retired for five years.
But he is still... John Wick.
We will see.
[in Indonesian] Be seeing you.
[in English] John, you're incredible.
translation.zh: 约翰 你太了不起了

translation.en: Exhausted,
outnumbered,
obviously in pain...
translation.zh: 很明显地 正承受着痛苦

translation.en: and you still beat all of my students.
translation.zh: 但你依然击退我所有的学生

translation.en: If I didn't have to kill you,
translation.zh: 如果我不是奉命取你人头

translation.en: we'd be... pals.
Let's do this.
See? We're the same.
I would like to suggest a parley.
A parley would be good.
Very well.
Are we in play, sir?
translation.zh: 先生 我们达成停火协议了吗？

translation.en: Oh, very much so.
Hey, John.
That was a pretty good fight, huh?
translation.zh: 那是一场很不错的对决吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
[Zero] Yeah.
Don't worry about me, John.
translation.zh: 你不用担心我 约翰

translation.en: I just gotta catch my breath.
I'll catch up to you, John.
translation.zh: 我会跟上你的 约翰

translation.en: No, you won't.
[The Adjudicator] You gentlemen, of course, realise that was the first wave.
translation.zh: 你们当然清楚那不过是第一波

translation.en: Merely an amuse-bouche.
We can keep this up as long as you'd like, but it only ends one way.
translation.zh:
我们可以一直继续下去
但结局只会有一个

translation.en: Are you sure a protracted war is the best way forward?
translation.zh: 你确定持久战是最好的解决方法？

translation.en: There won't be anything "protracted" about it.
translation.zh: 不可能一直持久下去的

translation.en: Oh, you can take the Continental, I have no doubt about that.
translation.zh:
你当然攻得下大陆酒店
这点我没有怀疑

translation.en: But keeping it, that's a different matter entirely.
translation.zh: 但要经营维持下去 又是另一个问题

translation.en: My allegiances run way beyond this building.
translation.zh: 我的势力可不仅限于在这栋建筑物里

translation.en: We are High Table.
And we...
are New York City.
-Are we negotiating? -[door opens]
I believe we are.
Parley?
[Winston] Parley.
[The Adjudicator] What do you propose we do?
Let me keep my power.
Under the Table.
[Winston] I have served
and been a beacon of order and stability to our industry for over 40 years.
translation.zh:
40年来一心为我们的行业
维持秩序与稳定

translation.en: Now, I humbly acknowledge I overstepped,
translation.zh: 我现在谦卑地承认我越界了

translation.en: and re-pledge my fealty to the High Table.
translation.zh: 再次向高桌会宣誓效忠

translation.en: Winston.
[The Adjudicator] You were merely showing strength so we would let you keep the Continental.
translation.zh:
你不过是为了让我们把
大陆酒店交还给你而巧言令色

translation.en: The High Table accepts your fealty.
But what about him?
What are we going to do about John Wick?
translation.zh: 我们要如何处置约翰维克？

translation.en: Oh, he has to die.
-Sorry, Jonathan. -[groans] Winston!
Don't see any other way.
Very well, gentlemen.
The Continental will now be reconsecrated.
translation.zh: 大陆酒店正式重新投入服务

translation.en: Good day to you both.
translation.zh: 祝两位有个美好的一天

translation.en: Well played, sir.
How long do you estimate until we reopen?
translation.zh: 你估计我们重新开张还需要多久？

translation.en: Oh, should be no time at all.
Mr Wick is gone.
A true tragedy.
You misunderstand. I mean that he is no longer on the street.
translation.zh:
你误会了
我的意思是他在街上消失了

translation.en: That seems improbable.
translation.zh: 这听起来让人难以置信

translation.en: And yet, true.
[The Adjudicator] I trust you understand the repercussions if he survives,
translation.zh: 如果他活了下来 你应该清楚后果

translation.en: both from above and below.
The last thing either one of us needs
translation.zh: 任何一个人都不想见到的情况

translation.en: is Mr Wick paying us a visit in the night.
translation.zh: 是维克先生在夜里前来探访我们

translation.en: For both our sakes, I'll hope you see to it
that this situation is taken care of, yes?
translation.zh: 我希望你能把情况控制好 好吗？

translation.en: Absolutely. How far can he get?
translation.zh: 当然 他还能逃多远？

translation.en: Baba Yaga.
[Bowery King] How you doing, John?
You look as bad as I feel.
translation.zh: 你看起来跟我的感觉一样糟透了

translation.en: Johnny, Johnny, Johnny.
Raise a hand if you can hear me, John.
translation.zh: 如果听到我说话 就举手 约翰

translation.en: Oh, shit. They took a finger.
translation.zh: 可恶 他们拿走了一只手指

translation.en: Ain't that a bitch? [chuckling]
Oh, John fucking Wick.
So, the old boy keeps his hotel and you take the fall.
translation.zh:
所以 那个老男人保住了酒店
而你背了黑锅

translation.en: I would've done the same thing if I was in his shoes.
translation.zh:
我也不能怪他 换作是我
也会做一样的事

translation.en: But this High Table shit...
Seven cuts.
Under the Table is where shit gets done.
And they're about to find out, if you cut a king,
translation.zh: 他们很快就会知道 如果你砍了国王

translation.en: you better cut him to the quick.
translation.zh: 最好快点将他碎尸万段

translation.en: So...
let me ask you, John.
How do you feel?
'Cause I am really pissed off.
You pissed, John?
Are you?
Yeah.
